These monsters don't appear on the mini map. Shadow warriors appear to be wielding battleaxes, but they attack at the same speed as scimitars. After completion of Legends' Quest, Shadow warriors are a possible Slayer task from Chaeldar and Vannaka.

Monster ID2853

A Shadow warrior is a deceased knight, back from the plane of death. However, they are not considered undead, so the salve amulet has no effect on them. These monsters don't appear on the mini map. Shadow warriors appear to be wielding battleaxes, but they attack at the same speed as scimitars. After completion of Legends' Quest, Shadow warriors are a possible Slayer task from Chaeldar and Vannaka.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Legends' Guild dungeon4819Maplink

Strategy[edit | edit source]

It is possible to safespot shadow warriors through the fence separating them from the pit scorpions.

Another spot to use is behind the fungus near the cavern wall. It is still possible to be attacked until the shadow warriors become non-aggressive.

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Shadow warrior kill is worth 298.58.
